attributes.action: Call an election to vote for new MPs to regain public trust, restore honour and purge the House of grasping greedy members.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the wake of the expenses outrage I would like the opportunity to vote for honest people who are not tainted by greed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
